ygData.subject: Re: To Wounded NOT To Accept.
ygData.msgSnippet: (Sorry! Sorry! Sorry! I din t mean to upset you Necromancer! I don t like having people mad at me, so I just wanna say I m really, really sorry! Sorry!)

(Sorry! Sorry! Sorry! I din't mean to upset you Necromancer! I don't like 
having people mad at me, so I just wanna say I'm really, really sorry! 
Sorry!)

Tavatron snarled softly under her breath. The sudden arrival of Necromancer 
had startled her. The current situation coupled with the past circumstances 
had left her rather edgy. She needed something to direct her anger at, 
something she stood a chance of destroying. Tavatron pulled her ears back in 
anger. She really was upset. She was mad at the Alliance for what they had 
done to her, her commander, and this beautiful glade.

Tavatron's vision had begun to grow progressively worse, but she could still 
see well enough to battle. Tavatron turned back to Dinobot as he turned 
towards her. He was sparking, but nothing nearly as serious as she thought. 
It was the mech-fluid loss that had really worried her.
Her own shoulder still sparked occasionally, but had stopped bleeding a 
little while ago. Suddenly, out of nowhere and with absolutely no warning 
what-so-ever Dinobot began yelling at her! A low growl began to form in the 
base of her throat. This was the last straw. She had reached her limit, 
DInobot's sudden outburst was all she needed to send her into a fit of rage. 
She wasn't a child! SHe was a warrior!

"You shouldn't be talking! I'm not the one whose missing half my armor!"

She truned from DInobot and focused her gaze on Necromancer:

"Take Dinobot back to base, he needs repairs. I feel like walking today."

She cast one lst glare in Dinobot's direction before setting off, only to 
get blasted in the side by Catgut's shots. She rolled for a few seconds 
before righting herself and returning his fire with several optic blasts of 
her own.
